name: Bun Thit Nuong
description: Bun Thit Nuong is a Vietnamese rice noodle dish with grilled pork, herbs, and a sweet and savory sauce.

name: Banh Canh
description: Banh Canh is a Vietnamese noodle soup made with thick tapioca noodles, broth, and various ingredients such as pork, shrimp, or crab.

name: Pho
description: Pho is a Vietnamese soup consisting of broth, rice noodles, herbs, and meat, usually beef or chicken.

name: Bun Bo Hue
description: Bun Bo Hue is a spicy Vietnamese soup containing rice vermicelli and beef.

name: Com Tam
description: Com Tam, or broken rice, is a Vietnamese dish made from rice with fractured rice grains.

name: Goi Cuon
description: Goi Cuon is a Vietnamese dish traditionally consisting of pork, prawn, vegetables, bún, and other ingredients wrapped in Vietnamese bánh tráng.

name: Banh Mi
description: Banh Mi is a Vietnamese sandwich consisting of a Vietnamese single-serving baguette, which is split lengthwise and filled with various savory ingredients.

name: Ca Kho To
description: Ca Kho To is a Vietnamese braised fish dish that is braised in a clay pot with a caramel sauce.

name: Bo Luc Lac
description: Bo Luc Lac is a Vietnamese dish of shaking beef, sautéed beef, or beef steak that is usually served with rice or noodles.

name: Cao Lau
description: Cao Lau is a regional Vietnamese dish made with noodles, pork, and local greens, and is only found in the town of Hoi An, in the Quang Nam Province of central Vietnam.

name: Bun Rieu
description: Bun Rieu is a traditional Vietnamese soup made with crab or shrimp paste, tomatoes, and tofu.

name: Cha Ca
description: Cha Ca is a Vietnamese dish of grilled fish, typically white fish such as snakehead fish or firm white fish like catfish, mixed with turmeric and other spices, and typically served with rice noodles, peanuts, and plenty of dill.

name: Bun Cha
description: Bun Cha is a Vietnamese dish of grilled pork and noodle, which is thought to have originated from Hanoi, Vietnam.

name: Canh Chua
description: Canh Chua is a sour Vietnamese soup that is typically made with fish, tomatoes, and pineapples, and flavored with tamarind and other spices.

name: Banh Xeo
description: Banh Xeo is a Vietnamese savory crepe made of rice flour, water, and turmeric powder, stuffed with slivers of fatty pork, shrimp, diced green onion, and bean sprouts.

name: Bun Bo Nam Bo
description: Bun Bo Nam Bo is a Vietnamese dish from southern Vietnam, made with rice noodles, beef, and various Vietnamese herbs.

name: Chao Ga
description: Chao Ga is a Vietnamese rice soup made from cooking rice in chicken broth until it becomes soft.

name: Banh Khot
description: Banh Khot is a Vietnamese savory mini-pancake made of rice flour, coconut milk, and turmeric.

name: Banh Tet
description: Banh Tet is a Vietnamese traditional cake made primarily from glutinous rice, which is rolled in a banana leaf into a thick, log-like cylindrical shape, with a meat or vegetarian filling.

name: Goi Tom
description: Goi Tom is a Vietnamese salad made with shrimp, vegetables, and various Vietnamese herbs.
